name: Bear, Black
description:
Black bears are omnivorous mammals that generally avoid humans unless provoked.

**Combat**: Use claws and bite, can hug on successful attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Live solitary in forests.

**Ecology**: Omnivores; eat berries, roots, and small animals.

name: Bear, Brown
description:
Brown bears are larger and more aggressive than black bears.

**Combat**: Powerful claw attacks and a bone-crushing hug.

**Habitat/Society**: Roam temperate forests and mountains.

**Ecology**: Hunt larger prey in addition to foraging.

name: Bear, Cave
description:
Cave bears are prehistoric relatives of modern bears, immensely strong and aggressive.

**Combat**: Massive claws, bite, and deadly hugs.

**Habitat/Society**: Found in cold mountainous areas.

**Ecology**: Top predators, hunting large prey.
